Package org.soen6441.model.orders

Class Blockade

java.lang.Object
org.soen6441.model.orders.Blockade
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Order
public class Blockade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Order
Blockade class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method. The object of this class is created when the player issues blockade command.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    The country of the player to be blocked

    The blockade order issuing player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Blockade

      public Blockade​(Player p_Player, Country p_TempCountry)
      Constructor which is called when the object of the blockade is created.
      Parameters:
      p_Player - The player who issues the blockade card
      p_TempCountry - The country on which blockade to be created

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      This method is called in the execute order phase. If blockade order is valid, it triples the number of armies to the country and makes the country neutral. (assigns to neutral player) It also removes the blockade card from the player's list.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Order

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      This method checks the validity of the blockade order issued by the player. This method returns false if the country doesn't belong to the player or player does not have blockade card.
      Returns:
      true if the order is valid, else false.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns the player who issued the blockade order.
      Returns:
      the player who issued the blockade order.

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(Player d_Player)
      Sets the player who issues the blockade order.
      Parameters:
      d_Player - Player who issues the blockade order.
